channel.title: 华尔街日报

item.title: Reddit 披露联邦贸易委员会正在调查其出售、授权或与第三方共享用户生成内容以训练人工智能模型的行为
item.description:
Reddit disclosed the Federal Trade Commission is looking into its sale, licensing or sharing of user-generated content with third parties to train artificial intelligence models https://t.co/CYqaMukJl3 https://t.co/CYqaMukJl3

item.title: "我太年轻了，不适合变老"。人们不遗余力地减少或阻止白发苍苍的过程。一些研究衰老问题的科学家认为，他们可能有所发现。
item.description:

item.title: 远离东京和京都的旅游人群，日本的一条多日徒步旅行线路让游客沉浸在 2011 年遭受毁灭性海啸袭击的社区的文化和美食之中

item.title: 丹-尼尔写道："福特 F-250 的设计者总是拒绝采用 21 世纪的解决方案，而倾向于使用更古老、更原始、更低效的技术，但最终却采用了更强大的技术。
item.description:
At every turn, Ford F-250's designers rejected 21st-century solutions in favor of older, more primitive, less efficient—and ultimately more robust—technologies, writes Dan Neil https://t.co/EXZu5wrYvi https://t.co/EXZu5wrYvi

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 15, 2024

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：对新日铁的政治反对与经济利益无关。这与克利夫兰-克里夫斯公司、钢铁工人工会以及 11 月份蓝领工人的选举竞争有关。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The political opposition to Nippon Steel isn’t about the economic merits. It’s about Cleveland-Cliffs, the steelworkers union and the electoral competition for blue-collar workers in November. https://t.co/OiNcMvBkps

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 15, 2024

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：欧洲极右翼运动最重要的策略就是永远不要赢得选举。对于欧洲的叛乱运动来说，执政是死亡之吻，或者至少是妥协之吻，@josephsternberg 写道。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The most important element of the European far-right playbook is never, ever actually to win an election. Governing has been the kiss of death, or at least compromise, for Europe’s insurgent movements, writes @josephsternberg. https://t.co/aDDN7r7nwr

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 15, 2024

item.title: 苹果公司已就投资者提起的集体诉讼达成 4.9 亿美元的和解协议，投资者称该公司在 2018 年隐瞒了中国市场对 iPhone 的需求下降情况
item.description:
